summary: QA Error Logging Integration - Backend APIs 100% working (20/20 tests passed). Frontend loads correctly with ErrorBoundary wrapping root layout and setupGlobalErrorHandler initialized.
critical_code_review_comments: POST /api/qa/errors/log correctly accepts frontend error logs with category, feature, error_type, message, severity, session_id, stack_trace, user_id, endpoint
GET /api/qa/errors returns logged errors with proper filtering by severity, category, resolved status, and pagination
GET /api/qa/errors/reference/{reference_id} correctly looks up errors by reference ID
GET /api/qa/health returns comprehensive system health status including database, api, payments, escrow, notifications services
ErrorBoundary component wraps RootLayout at /app/frontend/app/_layout.tsx line 110
setupGlobalErrorHandler() initialized at app startup (line 15 in _layout.tsx)
axios interceptor in /app/frontend/src/utils/api.ts (lines 24-48) logs API errors (non-401) to QA system via logApiError()
errorLogger.ts provides logError, logApiError, logUIError, logPaymentError, logAuthError helper functions
seed_data_creation: Test errors logged with TEST_ prefix during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: QA error logging integration fully tested. 20 backend tests cover all /api/qa/errors/* endpoints. Frontend integration verified: ErrorBoundary wraps root layout, global error handler initialized, axios interceptor logs API errors. Test reference IDs logged: ERR-2BE2E32A, ERR-5906A7DF, etc.

api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/qa/health: Returns overall_status (healthy/degraded/down), services health, error stats - WORKING
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/qa/health/services: Returns detailed health for database, api, payments, escrow, notifications, external_apis - WORKING
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/qa/errors/log: Logs frontend errors with category, feature, error_type, message, severity, session_id, stack_trace, user_id, endpoint - WORKING
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/qa/errors: Returns error logs with filtering by severity, category, feature, user_id, resolved, search - WORKING
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/qa/errors/reference/{reference_: Lookup error by reference ID - WORKING
